quoteFirst: In due course the train that bore Augusta and her fortunes, timed to reach Waterloo at
quoteLast: , rolled into the station. The train was a fast one, but the telegraph had been faster. All the evening papers had come out with accounts, more or less accurate, of their escape, and most of them had added that the two survivors would reach Waterloo by the 5.40 train.
title: Mr. Meeson's Will

quoteLast: The nearest telegraph office is at Spilsby.  Not much of the early history of this parish is to be found.

quoteLast: . You are going to be with the advance guard. You will be up front with the reserve. Your independent cavalry is to march at half past four.

quoteFirst: At forty-seven minutes after twelve he rose from table and went into the drawing-room; there the servant handed him an uncut copy of _The Times_, which Phileas Fogg folded and cut with a dexterity which denoted a practised hand. The perusal of this journal occupied him till a quarter to four, and then _The Standard_ sufficed till dinner-time. This repast was eaten under the same conditions as his breakfast, and at
quoteLast: he returned to the saloon and read _The Morning Chronicle_.
title: Round the World in Eighty Days
author: Verne, Jules, 1828-1905; Frith, Henry, 1840- [Translator]

quoteFirst: _--I was wakened early this morning by the sound of a crash. As it was mixed with my dreams I did not think it worth while to get up and investigate, but looked at my watch. It was
quoteLast: . Five minutes later I heard another crash under the dome--of the kind so often described--and looked out, but the house was perfectly still. I heard the servants come down about seven o'clock.
title:
The Alleged Haunting of B—— House
Including a Journal Kept During the Tenancy of Colonel Lemesurier Taylor

quoteFirst: In a recent case this point was very minutely examined by an advocate in the Scottish Court. One witness deponed that she saw the accused in a certain place at
quoteLast: "Are you sure," asked the learned counsel in a tone calculated to make a witness not quite sure after all, "are you sure it was not twenty minutes to six?" And then he seemed surprised at the laughter his question had raised.
title: Law and Laughter
author: Morton, George A. (George Alexander), 1857-; Malloch, D. Macleod (Donald Macleod), -1912

quoteLast: the gunboats and monitors were underweigh, moving up the bay.

quoteFirst: Edmunds on Monday would be despatched to Norwich at 5.30 A.M. on Tuesday. Reaching this place six hours thereafter, it would be forwarded thence at 4 P.M. to Newmarket, where it was due at 11 P.M. At Newmarket it would lie all night and the greater part of next day, and would only arrive at Bury at
quoteLast: on Wednesday. Thus three days were consumed in the journey of a letter from Ipswich to Bury by the nearest postal route, and nothing was to be gained by adopting the alternative route _viâ_ London.
title: A Hundred Years by Post: A Jubilee Retrospect
author: Hyde, James Wilson, 1841-1918

quoteFirst: "9. The weather moderated slightly during the afternoon of March 28, and at
quoteLast: the _Seminole_ with tow was brought up head to wind and sea on course northwest, making little if any progress. The gale increased again in force from 8 p.m. to midnight, and at 3 a.m. March 29 west was the best heading that could be held.
title:
Derelicts: An Account of Ships Lost at Sea in General Commercial Traffic
And a Brief History of Blockade Runners Stranded Along the North Carolina Coast, 1861-1865

quoteFirst: On the 17th August I returned to Baltimore on my way to Drohoregan Manor, the seat of Colonel Carroll, in Maryland, where I had been invited to spend a few days by his son-in-law, an English gentleman of my acquaintance. Leaving Baltimore at
quoteLast: , in company with Mr. Tucker Carroll, I proceeded by train to Ellicott’s Mills, a station fourteen miles on the Ohio and Baltimore railroad, from which our host’s residence is distant more than an hour’s drive.
title: My Diary: North and South (vol. 2 of 2)
author: Russell, William Howard, Sir, 1820-1907
